fields.headline: Football Weekly
fields.bodyText: Welcome to this special edition of Football Weekly. Joining James Richardson in the pod this week is Sean Ingle and, for the first time in person, Sid Lowe. The three amigos look back at the international and domestic highlights of 2006 and ahead to 2007. Plus, via the magic of the telephone, hear Kevin McCarra's thoughts on the past few months of football. Thanks for listening and for all you're comments on the blog. We'll be back next week with another Football Weekly. Happy new year from everyone at Football Weekly. Click here to listen now on your computer. Click here to subscribe free, via iTunes, and get the latest episode on your iPod every week. For the Football Weekly podcast feed, click here. Like it so much you can't bear to have missed a single word? Click here to catch up with any Football Weekly podcasts you might have missed so far.
